channel.title: For Ladies Only
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description:
Why am I single? Are there any relationships that can work for me? When will I get married? Are these questions similar to ones you have asked yourself, others, or even God? If so, this is the place to be! This program is not business as usual. Cradling the issues is not the practice of this fellowship; our purpose is to dig deep within ourselves - using the word of God as light to shed clarity on the strongholds that are causing many problems in our lives.
Before you listen or join in the discussion, there are three things that must be done to take full advantage of what is shared:
1) Pray; 2) Have an open mind; 3) Grab a bible or pull up a scriptural website, along with pen and paper, or a journal for notes and reflections. For weekly discussions, please join our new blog at: www.forladiesonly1.blogspot.com. FLOing with God will never be the same! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Latter Rain Ministries
channel.itunes:subtitle: For Ladies Only

channel.itunes:keywords: dating, courtship, christian singles, marriage, sex, love, christian living, bible study, godly women, fellowship, singles, friendships

item.title: Diaries of a Bad Girl, Part 3 - For Ladies Only - Episode 24
item.author: LRMinistries@hotmail.com
item.description: Have you continually held onto relationships or ideals that didn't work in past relationships? What about now? Are you compromising in your relationship just to make it work? In the continuation of this series, we will explore Lot's wife and her diary entry, "Losing Myself."
item.itunes:author: Latter Rain Ministries
item.itunes:subtitle: Diaries of a Bad Girl, Part 3 - For Ladies Only - Episode 24
item.itunes:summary: Have you continually held onto relationships or ideals that didn't work in past relationships? What about now? Are you compromising in your relationship just to make it work? In the continuation of this series, we will explore Lot's wife and her diary entry, "Losing Myself."
item.itunes:keywords: dating, courtship, christian singles, marriage, sex, love, christian living, bible study, godly women, fellowship, singles, friendships

item.title: Diaries of a Bad Girl, Part 2 - For Ladies Only - Episode 23
item.author: LRMinistries@hotmail.com
item.description: How many times have you settled for a relationship only to wonder if there was another meant for you? Or have you found yourself so desperately wanting a particular man that you would do "anything" for him? In the continuation of this series, we will explore Potipher's wife and her diary entry, "Having Him."
item.itunes:author: Latter Rain Ministries
item.itunes:subtitle: Diaries of a Bad Girl, Part 2 - For Ladies Only - Episode 23

item.title: Diaries of a Bad Girl, Part 1 - For Ladies Only - Episode 22
item.author: LRMinistries@hotmail.com
item.description: Have you ever heard the saying, you have to play "dirty" to get what you want? Did you actually try it? In this study we will be exploring one aspect of a bad girl with Eve and her story, "Something on the side."
item.itunes:author: Latter Rain Ministries
item.itunes:subtitle: Diaries of a Bad Girl, Part 1 - For Ladies Only - Episode 22

item.title: MInisterial Dating - For Ladies Only - Episode 21
item.author: LRMinistries@hotmail.com
item.description: At some point, we all have tried to convert or persuade someone we were dating to come to the Lord after being in a relationship. Why is this a mistake? Why should we avoid being unequally yoked? Listen in as we study the dating practice of "ministerial" dating.
item.itunes:author: Latter Rain Ministries
item.itunes:subtitle: MInisterial Dating - For Ladies Only - Episode 21
item.itunes:summary: At some point, we all have tried to convert or persuade someone we were dating to come to the Lord after being in a relationship. Why is this a mistake? Why should we avoid being unequally yoked? Listen in as we study the dating practice of "ministerial" dating.
item.itunes:keywords: dating, courtship, christian singles, marriage, sex, love, christian living, bible study, godly women, fellowship, singles, friendships
